Powershell Snippets

Apr 16, 2021

Get-ChildItem -File -r where {$_.fullname -match “cshtml”} foreach { git mv ($.fullname) ($.fullname –replace “cshtml”,”razor”) }
Get-ChildItem -Dir -r where {$_.fullname -match “obj bin”} foreach {$_.fullname}
